website_summaries.verdict: Praised for its remarkably thorough layout, this is a great tool for all your workout needs.
pros: One page dedicated to tracking progress over 20-week period
Space to jot down routine workouts and exercises
Included graphics provide information on body and target exercises
cons: May be a little complex for those wanting a simple fitness journal

customer_reviews.title: What more could you ask for from a Fitness book? This has a lot packed into it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I wish there was one for yearly! 12 weeks seems like it's going to just FLY by! Either way I love the ease of use, each day with writing space and information on warm up's, cool down's, accurate workouts per muscle group guide, and WAY more, measurements before & after photos areas etc. What more can you ask for out of a book!? I was concerned about it being a spiral bound & not hardcover but now that I have it I prefer the flexibility of the book and have had NO issues with how well made the plastic Spiral is! I highly recommend this for anyone on this lifestyle change!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Great little workout journal, needs some proofreading
customer_reviews.text: As a workout journal, this has suited my purposes very well. I don't need a book that has room to log my food intake, I really just want something where I can plan my workout in advance, and then be able to review past weights/reps. I also need it to be big enough to write in, but not giant size. Surprisingly, there are few options out there. This journal works perfectly. I took off a star because 1) the cover is very ugly and 2) there is a misspelling on the cover. I'm not the grammar police, but someone really should have at least proofread before sending to print.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Track your fitness
customer_reviews.text: I have been logging my workouts over 20 yrs now, and I must say it’s hard to find a log book that fits my needs. This book is perfect for logging gym routines. There’s no extra stuff need when trying to keep workouts in a gym log (ie. Nutrition). Plenty room to fit a longer workout routine. I love the results and the progress pages added to keep an active measure of where one may need to improve. Nice thick sturdy pages. I believe ones visual improvements/progress is what drives us to keep striving for more. Yes, overall I would recommend this log booklet for gym routines.
customer_reviews.author: Arli

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly value, very useful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 weeks. I really love this journal. It really does a great job of tracking my workouts easily with a big ring in the back that can hold my pen. Surprisingly strong construction easily survives being in and out of a gym bag as well as being hauled around the gym. Even though I really don't use it much, the compact "what muscles get worked out with what exercises" in the back is actually useful. I will be rebuying once I run out of fresh space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me — too much to record
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy book, but I could never get myself to actually use it. There’s only one page to record my measurements (befores then presumably an afters page towards the end of the book). Then, there’s an application to complete for each daily log... just a lot of text. I find the MyFitnessPal app way more helpful: it’s easier to take with me & easier to complete. If you prefer to write though, this meal planner/exercise log may be for you. I’ll use a regular notebook to record the necessities for my purposes since I only care about measurements and fitness milestones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION. SO SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: I've searched all over for the perfect fitness journal. Most need too much information, and some don't leave me enough room for what I want. This is an amazing journal. Log your measurements, body fat, weight, workouts (reps/weight), cardio, space for notes about the workout, water intake, macros.. and for a great price. IN LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Tracker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little book and will definitely be buying more when the 12 weeks are up! I have used every digital app/tracker there is, but for me, there is something about writing everything down at the end of the day that has renewed my motivation. I like being able to see everything laid out and being able to track my sleep, water, mood, etc. I also love how many tracking possibilities there are in the beginning including measurements, goals, healthy meals, preferred workouts, goals, affirmations, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AnneKay11

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great straight forward, easy to fill in diary for those wanted to track their daily eating and workouts. Does the job! My biggest problem was the cover was rather flimsy and got bashed up pretty easily so if you are going to be throwing it in your gym bag and carrying it a lot then likely to fall apart quickly. Cannot fault the layout though as is one of the clearest tracking books I have ever seen. So therefore even though the cover is easily trashed I still give it 5 stars for ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Keep Track of Your WorkOuts
customer_reviews.text: Nice size with a good spiral binding. I saw a couple of comments about the cover but who cares, I keep it open to my last workout and will most likely not see the cover until this is filled up. It has a small section on each page for notes and nutrition and will allow tracking of weights and repetitions for up to 6 sets for 14 different exercises. I am using this in conjunction with the dumbbell exercise cards by the same company. Together they are a winning combination.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Very good journal to record workout
customer_reviews.text: I recently re-joined a gym and was looking for a workout journal to record my lifting sessions. I expected to be able to buy one at the gym (LA Fitness) but they only provide for individuals paying for private trainer sessions. This journal looks very similar to the LA Fitness one; enough so that I have had front desk people ask if I was there for a trainer session when they see me holding it. I am about half way through it so I re-purchased the journal in the combo two pack which is a better deal than individual purchases. Overall, I am very happy with this workout journal!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rogero

customer_reviews.title: All in one tracker
customer_reviews.text: I like this one especially because it allows me to track food and exercise in detail, compared to other journals and trackers that are great at one or the other. This one includes so much great information too, like bmi breakdowns, average calories in common foods, goals, etc. *Update* I've since purchased the fitness only journals once my fitness and nutrition journal was filled up, and I still LOVE them. Such great information, and really helps to keep track of my fitness as well as body measurements, etc.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great for recording nutrition and fitness
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd journal I have ordered from this line. The 1st with the nutrition element. The book is laid out perfect for keeping track of daily nutrition/meals/macros. It has plenty of room to record workouts. Enough columns for 6 sets per exercise with rep/weight areas. It also has areas for water intake, cardio notes, and a few other things. It meets all of my needs and I would highly recommend this book if you want to keep a record of your fitness journey.
customer_reviews.author: Msmeans

customer_reviews.title: A great way to stay organized-- until my dog ate it
customer_reviews.text: On the recommendation of a friend of mine, I decided to purchase one of these organizers. I received it, put my workout routine and other info in it, used it for my daily workout, came home and jumped in the shower. When I came out, my husky had my organizer out of my gym bag (which I inadvertently left unzipped) and was gnawing on the pages. Needless to say I was not a happy camper. I will have to order another one on Friday but I did want to leave a review to say that the organization offered in this log book is really awesome and I cant wait to utilize my next one :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what your looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This log book is exactly what I was looking for! It keeps me on track with my goals and makes it easy to remember what I’m supposed to be working on from day to day. There are tons of apps that claim to do the same thing, but there is something Satisfying about turning the pages in my log book each week. I can’t wait to fill every page and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fitness Log
customer_reviews.text: This workout log is simple and straightforward. Perfect size, plenty of room for a long list of exercises without being bulky. Undated so you're not tied to a specific calendar. The spiral is great, easy to flip through without pages sticking together. Thick paper that can handle writing on both sides. Each page has an area for tracking nutrition, which I don't use, so I can't speak to whether it's helpful. But, seems like a good area for tracking supplements. It's exactly what I've been looking for in terms of design and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Teaboonhills

customer_reviews.title: Great workout journal
customer_reviews.text: Great notebook for strength training in particular. Has great before and after sections that give space to write out quantifiable goals and also keep track of workout routines that you’ve liked for future workouts. It also has a small area for cardio and for nutrition / notes which is nice. Only suggestion would be to make the nutrition section bigger since for me the food that fuels my workouts is super important to have a good day at the gym so I would like to track it. Currently a little hard with the amount of space there. Love this book overall and will buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Utkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and spot on!!
customer_reviews.text: This workout journal / log book is awesome!! I can log my workouts, my meals, make notes, measure improvements and more!! I've had other books in the past but this is by far the best and most complete. IF you want to keep up with your daily workouts and meal plans then look no further cuz this book does it all and more. I'll be buying another one when this one runs out. Thanks for making a sensible usable product!!
customer_reviews.author: mark l. brown

customer_reviews.title: Well thoughtout, but should be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Good for gym but way too expensive for a notebook... Each one shouldn't cost more than $5... A lot of thought has gone into it though so overall it's pretty good to track gym workout
customer_reviews.author: HelloWorld

customer_reviews.title: Motivation Tracker
customer_reviews.text: I am 57 and am using this product as a kick-start to eating right and exercising. There is ample room on each meal section to list out the food Macro's; and also a section for weight and exercise. My GOAL is to run a 1/2 marathon in 7 months, so I am well on my way to achieve it. Tracking progress gives you the motivation to keep up the work to finish strong and this journal is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Workout Journal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this notebook for my fiance who likes to track his workouts. He raves about it and looks forward to writing everything down. It's easy to follow and has all of the right columns to fill out inside. It seems like there are a lot of pages so you shouldn't have to buy many throughout the year. The size is also really nice, it's small enough to fit in his gym bag and lug around from weights to machine.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for notes page
customer_reviews.text: If it only had a few pages for notes. You know places to put more principles, , multiple training styles, facts, things to remember. If it had like 20 pages for just notes this would be the all rounded perfect fitness journal. But it does not so for that lacking I give it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Gains baby!
customer_reviews.text: This logbook is perfect for tracking your habits good or bad. You’re able to see how well you preform in your workouts and compare that to the amount of sleep, calories, etc. you’ve taken in the day prior or same day, etc. definitely take advantage of how simple yet effective this logbook is. You’ll see your strength sky rocket as you can see your progress on paper and fine tune your routine.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. I've tried to keep track of workouts in plain notebooks and apps but neither worked just right. I love the layout of each page as well as the calendar tracker at the beginning to keep me motivated on how many workouts I've done. It has a spot to record goals as well as measurements. I work out 4-6 days a week and it has lasted almost 6 months (couple weeks shy). I've already bought another to keep on using!
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition and Exercis in one diary
customer_reviews.text: I was recently diagnosed as pre-diabetic. My doctor told me to fix my diet and exercise. This journal allows me to track both diet and exercise in one easy-to-carry notebook. The cover is a sort of plastic that repels liquids and doesn't stain. This is handy because I make entries on the kitchen counter. I am able to record grams of protein, fat, and carbohydrates. There is also a place to record the amount of water I drink (a requirement for my urologist). The journal has so many features that I am confident you will use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: james reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. I used to work out in the past & kind of gave up. Now that I’m back into it I thought this book would be great. I’m they type of person to write everything down & if I can physically write & see my workouts & things like that I’m more inclined to stick with it. I like how it has the calendar page, so on days I’m not going into the gym I can put a W for walking or a B for biking, etc. Anyway, I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. You have many options to document your workouts
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed. Very sturdy. You have many options to document your workouts. I especially like how commonly used data blocks were already put in such as reps and weights.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Best strength tracking journal EVER
customer_reviews.text: This book is the best for tracking my strength training! It’s the first book that I don’t have to create a column for! It also has a nice hard cardboard cover which is lightweight, yet protects the pages while is jostled around in my gym bag. I have been a workout enthusiast for a quite a few decades and this is by far the best tracking system in hard copy form. It arrived very quickly and was followed up with a nice email asking if I had any questions for them and to confirm that I received it. I almost want to buy a few more just in case I can’t get this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a weightlifter, you need this notebook.
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING! I have so much room to write my routines down on, the workouts themselves, and it is not the size of a pocket notebook. Seriously, this is the beat notebook out there for weightlifters. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hoyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but a little too much
customer_reviews.text: The book is very sturdy, it will be excellent for someone who is exercising with a trainer and doing the whole professional weigh loss. I just wanted a place to track my callories and write down if I worked out. The workout section takes the whole page and I feel like it it too much. Next time I will get something more basic.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this little book. It is very easy to use, follow, and it's size makes it possible to bring everywhere! It's semi- hard cover, yet sturdy. There's room on each page for the usual things such as daily food intake, exercise entries, food nutrition area but my favorite thing is the section for daily notes/ reflections and little faces to color in on how you were feeling that day. I have no doubt that this little book will help me on my weight loss journey.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: This book is perfectttttt! I bought the workout book a year ago (the one without the nutrition pages) and I loved using that. When I found that the same company also made this book with the nutrition section, i had to jump on it. When you open it up, boom that’s your whole day and everything important to look at. Very sturdy also, you won’t regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: moolissa373

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Tracking your workouts is essential to succeed in weight training. All successful bodybuilders will tell you that. This notebook was excellent to help me get in the rhythm of logging your training. It was great to have a guide to use at first. Now that I know what I need, I'll make my own guide that is more suitable for my training style. Good buy for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I Use this Regularly
customer_reviews.text: I get asked at the gym all the time where I got this. Since I retired in January I have got back to regular exercise and weight training. This has allowed me to track my progress and make notations when I want to up weights and alter or upgrade work outs. When I run out of space I will order another. Easy to take with me.
customer_reviews.author: mrsogni

customer_reviews.title: A priority for tracking you without progress
customer_reviews.text: This book is perfect for keeping track of your workouts. It allows you to track your progress on the weights you lift but also your weight, the time and date of each workout. I’ve tried to just use notebooks previously but I’m never able to accurately keep so many details. This book is a great price for the benefit it will bring you.
customer_reviews.author: David Langtry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you want something simple to write down your daily calorie consumption, exercise, water. Then an app should be your call. But if you're anything like me, and you need to write it down. Then this is for you! I truly love this notebook. Currently going on a very strict diet and it helps writing everything down including my daily notes of how I felt and my workout. I love going back on my notes and seeing my improvements, and reading my notes. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LittleMouse

customer_reviews.title: Thorough and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've just begun using this tracker but so far so good. It has plenty of room to write down everything in detail. All nutrition facts are categorized and subtotals and totals for every meal of the day including snacks. Seems like they've thought of everything even capturing your overall mood for the day as well as your activity and sleep. I'm really enjoying it so far. I know from experience that when you use this type of tracking method, it helps tremendously in keeping you accountable for what you eat and do throughout the day. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Selena A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a fitness/nutrition log book to keep track of my workouts and food for weight loss. This is everything I wanted and more. I am so happy with this purchase and started using it as soon as it came. Plenty of room to record a full workout and keep track of your daily food. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Longo

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this twice. And I love it. It’s simple and gives all the info needed to track your works outs. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBills

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective and informative!
customer_reviews.text: Great little fitness tracker for sure! I've been looking for something that keeps me, well, on track, and this definitely works! The set up is simple yet effective. There are sections for you to record your measurements (the only true way to measure your progress) as well as a diagram of exercises divided up by what body parts they concentrate on. Great for planning your daily workout! I've recommended this little book to those I know who are trying to get back on the fitness train. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Buy themmmmmmm just do it
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love these books I was working out at the gym constantly for 7 months and didn’t see nearly as much results as I did at home while tracking everything I did. These books made me realize I wanna be a nutritionalist and trainer I’m so in love with every mark i wrote in these books
customer_reviews.author: Randy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is a WONDERFUL health tracking journal!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this journal. It’s just exactly what I was looking for when I bought it. I keep track of food, steps, calories, blood pressure, temperature, weight, etc. I also put my frequently used recipes in it and notes. It’s WONDERFUL if you’re looking for a good health tracking journal.
customer_reviews.author: jlsnette

customer_reviews.title: Great book for tracking my Gym Rotation!
customer_reviews.text: Since I rotate what a do at the gym each time, this book is great for planning. I do use FriXon erasable pens, so I can add or remove things without wasting pages or crossing off lines. Since I don't carry my book around the gym with me, I plan everything ahead of time and snap a picture with my phone. While in the gym I track my reps/sets/Weight by texting it to myself. Then I can update my book when I get home. This has really helped me stay on track and motivated!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and full of good info
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t actually used this yet, still figuring out a fitness plan. But it is very nice. Great quality and I love that it is a spiral book so you can turn the pages and they stay put. It’s a really helpful product and I’d recommend it to anyone that’s trying to get in better shape and needs some structure in order to do it.
customer_reviews.author: SallyMay13

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This book is just about perfect. The layout is extremely easy and logical. Everything you could want in a workout book, when you are not looking to track food. It’s size is great, the binding allows a pen to clip in and remain handy. The only change I would make (more like an addition) would be to add extra measurement trackings. I would rather track measurements than weight. I will likely continue to purchase these for myself and partner when the time comes to do so again. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: One of a couple

customer_reviews.title: The Only thing I would do Differently
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I would do differently would be to buy separate fitness and nutrition journals because I found that with the combined book I was skipping workout pages because I can't work out Every day but of course I eat every day. There are only about 66 days worth of nutrition&workout pages and it would have been more productive if I had got the two separated journals.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Elpedes Jr

customer_reviews.title: You will love how convenient this book is.
customer_reviews.text: I had to have another sent to me because the first one came to me bent. Easy replacement, fast shipping and the customer service employee for Amazon was very nice and helped me. This book is very easy to write and keep track of workouts/nutrition. I'd reccomend this to anyone who is making a lifestyle change.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: If you think it'd help, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a normal quality journal but I think it'd be okay in a duffel bag or backpack. This is perfect for my needs right now during quarantine. Not being able to go to the gym and being at home make me want to be lazy and eat junk but I know it is not good for me to do that all day everyday. This journal keeps me accountable in other ways apps cant. I want my daily meals and workout to be side by side so I'm encouraged to log and workout. Also, I like the starting measurement page because this book is going to be a fun challenge for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tracker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the nutrition and workout logbook combo and have been very pleased overall. I like how there is plenty of space for the workouts so that I can clearly write down each lift and assistance exercise as well as sets/reps/1RMs. This makes it very easy to track goals over a long period of time or track a pattern of possible injuries by noting it with each routine. The only possible down side is you will have to buy multiple a year to track but I’d rather have small manageable books with larger print than one giant book and tiny handwriting. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I do recommend this to those that like to keep task on their progress or would like to on their workout, weight loss, or trying to change their life style. This book has tons of ideas on what healthy foods, calories, and other interesting things. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aya A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Encouraging
customer_reviews.text: it has so many ways to keep track of everything I MEAN everything!!! You dont have to use it all though if its confussing and discourages you but the workout log is simple yet has room for keeping data and reps and even the weights you used for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nopeace1987

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nutritional planner
customer_reviews.text: Book has helpful guides for dieting. each page has a number of topics that could be tracked. Very flexible for varied diet plans. I found this extremely helpful with ample space to track each meal and snack. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Spolar

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this workout log book
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this workout log book. I have been through several books and this is my favorite so far. There is plenty of space for multiple exercise and set/rep/weight log space, and daily weight. Also a section to keep track of your progress and a section to log some of your favorite workouts/exercise. Lots of sheets for your daily logging, which is my favorite part. Would recommend this (and have) to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: darlene369

customer_reviews.title: Great log book!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a detailed log of my weight lifting sessions and this is the best one I’ve found. The cover is sturdy, it lays flat when open (important for me as a lefty) and most importantly it has all the right information in a neat package. I liked it so much I purchased another one as a gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So happy I bought it. It’s a great way to keep track of my workouts and I like the notes section on every page to quickly reference my training max to base my lifts on. Laughed at the small cardio section because let’s be honest...cardio is the worst and everyone knows it. ;) As far as sturdiness and whatnot - it’s paper, so... but the covers are a thick card stock. I’ve been throwing it in my bag and of course there’s some wear on the corners, but it’s no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kreviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fitness log!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a week now--and I love it! It has spaces for all the info I want to record...plenty of room, yet the notebook is a good size to fit into my small gym bag which I take out into the gym with me. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sue Collier

customer_reviews.title: You get what you put into it! It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the person who needs help step by step. Helps you stay organized and great for someone who already is. I love how it has step by step instructions. Good quality. Fast shipping. Great if you are able to train/discipline yourself to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ems15mh

customer_reviews.title: Great books!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both of these books for my husband to use for tracking his weight lifting progress. They are very nicely bound and have a nice look on the outside. Inside there are several charts, graphs, and logs to help track everything. Overall very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent journal for keeping track of what was done at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent journal for keeping track of what was done at the gym, including number of reps and weight. The size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: So I dont really write reviews, I just usually get my product and then I'm good. But I'm currently overseas in the middle east with the military. And my fiancee always rights here workouts on a notebook, so I thought it would be awesome if she had something more official. So I decided to surprise here and to my surprise she loved it alot. And then i received a email from the owners and learned a little more about there story and felt I needed to write a review about it. Again this is a good product and my lady liked it so, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: william farmer

customer_reviews.title: Functions Well
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and was what I was looking for. I was mainly looking for a fitness journal with plenty of space to write my exercises, reps, and weight. This one provides that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Bangs

customer_reviews.title: Useful book
customer_reviews.text: Honestly SUCH a good product for the price. I love finding things like this on amazon because i don’t have to go searching store to store to find something that is probably lower quality. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marcus childs

customer_reviews.title: Workout journal
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to use, boring, confusing, and Not inspiring. What can I say. It needs to make me understand the rep system what’s good better or best about the workout system. It can use improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tandgn

customer_reviews.title: any type of fitness tracking.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have, I use this as a training journal, it has good information on the inside pages. Plenty of writing space on the tabs. Over all its a good dairy/journal what ever one wants to call it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitness Tracking Journal
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for tracking which workouts I have done and set/reps/resistance etc. I follow on online workout so I can watch video ahead of time and write down which exercises are involved to make transitions smoother as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality notebook. Pages are thick and don't bleed through from pens. Good quality front back and spiral. Can take it on the go without worrying that ill ruin it. The website they suggest using for some things like bmr has good information. Bought a couple to help my family and I track our food journey. Would suvgest using this for anyone that has a fitness journey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Received product within 3 days of initial order. Exceeds expectations and great price. Plenty of room to record lifting progress. Someone commented that the cover was boring, don’t let that deter you from making the purchase. If you don’t like the cover, use this space for some motivational stickers or pictures...get creative with it.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Good way to track workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to track my workouts and these are very suitable. I can track exercise, reps and weight for up to fifteen exercises per day. Can track body weight, start/stop time, space for notes, track cardio and rate workout. There is also pages in the front to track overall progress. I am glad I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gabrielson

customer_reviews.title: So many details.
customer_reviews.text: Theres a ton of space for all sorts of details about your day. A little too much for me! If you wants something basic this would not be for you. This is for someone who wants to document everything about their body, food intake, exercise and monitor changes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy Way to Track Your Workouts/Progress
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier than writing work outs freestyle in a regular notebook. I am old-school and like to write them with pen and paper, and this works great for me! I love it that is has pages where you can track your progress by filling in the blanks (I use them for tracking weight loss, push-up max, chin-up max, 1-mile run time, etc.). I am definitely planning to order this again when I get near the end of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Weight Loser/Muscle Gainer

customer_reviews.title: Seems easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Last 5 pages are upside down. Considering there’s a gazillion pages you can use front and back, I can deal. I’m going to take this to my personal training sessions until I’m more independent with my workouts. Right now I’m clueless. I look forward to tracking my progress.
customer_reviews.author: Bear59

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lots of space to track your workouts.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest workout log. Plenty of space to track your workouts, very sturdy thick pages that hold up against months of daily use in the gym. I’ve reordered after i filled the first one and even bought one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner to keep you on track!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great source for keeping track of eating and workouts. I like that it tracks both on the same open pages, so there is not any flipping back-n-forth. Plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep track!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a transformation journey and I constantly have trouble keeping track of my workouts. On top of that, I suffer from body dysmorphia which without seeing results, hurts my moral. This tracker is keeping me motivated so far and looking forward to using the after photo box! Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great tracking log but the spiral binding is already undone
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my boyfriend - can't say much in terms of actual usefulness but to me it seems really great and the content seems helpful and a wonderful tracking log. My issue with it is that I literally flipped through it once and the spiral binding is already coming undone at the top. I don't know if this is a structural or shipping issue but it's extremely annoying and difficult to fix - the back page is already falling out. The log itself seems fantastic but the spiral binding is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Tracking diet and exercise
customer_reviews.text: This book has so much to offer. From tracking your diet to your daily moods. Huge amount of space for logging you exercise too. Way more than I excepted. The price is amazing great deal
customer_reviews.author: Barbara O'Coy

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I recently became a pescatarian and wanted to keep track of what I eat, and any changes that I see in my body after the diet change. This workbook makes it so easy to keep track of what you eat and progress being made.
customer_reviews.author: Shyonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect exercise journal. I'd only consider adding a few more nutrition lines/more specific but by far this is the best journal I've come across yet.
customer_reviews.author: TheCaffeinatedKeto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I wanted to be able to track workouts and body improvements. Most fitness journals I found for women included a diet component, which was very disappointing...message received. This journal has a place for measurements, goals, and space to write routines down. Just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Simple, organized and does not contain any additional information that is not needed or used. The pages are thick and durable, format is realistic and clean. Will be ordering a second one once this one is filed up
customer_reviews.author: EHahn

customer_reviews.title: Its alright.
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought just the workout one. But it is decent. I forgot I spent almost 15...not worth that price. But oh well. It is making me track my workouts now. I use the nutrition pages like the workout pages.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good room and organization
customer_reviews.text: The book is well made, supplies the basic information you need when quickly referencing workout info (e.g. muscle groups, etc). Has ample room to record workouts, cardio and to put in notes with a page per day. This is the second time I am buying this one. Looked around when first one running out and came back to this.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife since she is very new to lifting. It helps her keep track of progress and she loves it. A little pricey, but worth it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I always made a workout log in my bullet journal to keep track of how much I could lift, but I got so tired of creating a new one every time I worked out. This is perfect, it's very no frills. It has a little section to write down measurements and goals, a very small chart with workout suggestions for each body part, and a little list section for whatever. All of that only takes up the first few pages and rest are all about the workout! Perfect replacement for the bullet journal.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Solid and simple
customer_reviews.text: The layout is superb, I really like it. I anticipate purchasing this again once the current one is filled completely. So yes, I'd buy again, 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: My favorite workout tracker!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tracker. So much simpler than the ones I've had in the past. I like just tracking each workout on a page. Small notes section on each page. I also like that it gives you 6 sets to work with for each exercise. Good quality, pages are nice and thick. Seems well put together
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mayhan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT book for tracking meal, mood, measurements etc........ I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Soo worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this fitness journal. Easy to use, just wish there were a few more lines for each meal which is needed for high calorie diet. Trainer and nutritionists approves!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and myself have been using these books for a couple of weeks and have all positive things to say. It is small enough to carry with you while you workout, but has enough room to document your workout. The layout is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Holds up well at the gym. I spill water and sweat and the pages hold tough. I treat pretty badly and it has held up for 8 weeks now. Tracks everything that I need, exercise, weight, reps and sets.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Very Detailed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but the spaces to write your food need to be bigger. And they don’t give you very many lines. Other than that it’s a great way to journal your food and other things for the day
customer_reviews.author: Becky Longo

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing error ?!
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to say I actually like the actuallynlog portion of this journal. I don’t really care for the extras at the beginning. That said, I would of given this more stars had the log pages not been upside down like other reviews have stated. I was going to return for another one but realized the pages being upside down didn’t really bother me. I think a slightly smaller version would be nice and would fit into a small waist pack.
customer_reviews.author: julie g

customer_reviews.title: A must for fitness!!!
customer_reviews.text: This journal is seriously the best. I am awful when it comes to using apps on my phone to measure my progress. The problem I have with apps is having them stay on top of mind when it comes to using them. This journal is a part of my gear and I bring it with me when I work out. It’s great because you not only see how you’re progressing but it helps me to want to push harder than the week before.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto A. Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Nice tracker!
customer_reviews.text: Simply laid out! Enough space to fill in what you want to track. Very user friendly and a quick centrally located overall look at your progress. Durably constructed...sweat wipes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The book feels great, comes with a lot of pages to keep track of the workouts you do throughout the day. In my opinion, a must have for any day of working out. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Tracker
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is super sturdy and has a lot of helpful pointers and tips included! I love the amount of space it has to track calories, nutrition, weight lifting, etc. I will be purchasing this again once I use it up!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great little planner for the organized trainee.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband who has started weight training and he loves it. Loves how he can log exactly what he has done how he is progressing and what he needs to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Extra room and excellent prompts
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this book- cannot believe I haven't thought of it before room in front to jot down total body exercises as well as suggested exercises with targeted muscles
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: Great journal - everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Not complicated, well laid out, can take a reasonable beating in a gym bag, good paper stock. This is a terrific tracker journal.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bison

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. Didn't fit my exercise pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever daily journal!
customer_reviews.text: We chose this one because our usual one would take a few weeks longer. These came in a couple of days and we love it. I'll return the other ones. If they ever get here.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Beattie

product_meta.title: Workout/Fitness and/or Nutrition Journal/Planners - Designed by Experts, w/Illustrations : Sturdy Binding, Thick Pages & Laminated, Protected Cover
feature_bullets: GET FITTER FASTER (1-pack, 126 daily workout pages per book): Studies show tracking your progress with a fitness log can help you achieve your goals sooner and stay on course for the long term.
CREATED BY PROS: Your exercise log book was developed by people who know the science of working out. It's endorsed by personal trainers & military fitness experts.
DETAILED TRACKING: Record goals & starting / ending stats and track progress & workout frequency. Includes graphics that show which exercises target which muscles & a guide for measuring body fat.
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Not a flimsy notebook. Your activity diary is made with a sturdy wire binding, durable thick pages that won't tear & a thick cover with laminated protective coating..
WHETHER YOU'RE TRAINING, trying to lose weight or just want to be aware of your workouts, harness the power of journaling with this premium logbook from NewMe Fitness.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
